melting.patternModels.cricksPair
Class CricksNNMethod

java.lang.Object
  melting.patternModels.PatternComputation
      melting.patternModels.cricksPair.CricksNNMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternComputationMethod
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecomposedInitiation, Freier86, GlobalInitiation, Santalucia04, Sugimoto95, Sugimoto96, Turner06, Xia98
public abstract class CricksNNMethod
extends PatternComputation

This class represents the NN nearest neighbor model (adds the thermodynamic energy (enthalpy and entropy) for each Crick's pair composing the duplex). It extends PatternComputation..
